definitions.definition: A large kerchief , usually colourful and used either as headgear or as a handkerchief , neckerchief , bikini , or sweatband .

A style of calico printing , in which white or bright spots are produced upon cloth previously dyed a uniform red or dark colour, by discharging portions of the color by chemical means, while the rest of the cloth is under pressure.

main_definition: A large kerchief , usually colourful and used either as headgear or as a handkerchief , neckerchief , bikini , or sweatband .
